divs: Sighting Detailsevery night i walk my dogs out,i live in the country so i don't have many bright lights, anyhow it started last year (i think) when i walk my dogs i look up at the night sky and i alwasy see this certin star or whater it is but its just hanging pulsating blue,green,yellow,red,purple and white. its mainly in the west north-west sky.this past summer i got a telescope a small Wall-Mart type just a cheap one,i can see Jupitor and three moons and i can see Saturn its fuzzy but i can see it.anyway i start looking at these bright star like things,and as i see closer i notice that its so bright it fills the lens with light(like looking at the moon).the more i look i see more of these things all pulsing red,blue,green,purple and white.there is one that is either closer or brighter than the others,but when i look at it it looks like a black round object with three dots in the middle shaped like a triangle,and the edges look to be on fire with the flame changeing colors and that one is in the east north-east sky.i dont think its a satr or a galaxy.it could be a satalite. Thank You For Your Time
